name: Blue Moon
storyline: The music loving hero that lives by the rule of "not performing in front of others" meets a ghost who has lost her memory. During the search, the ghost falls in love with him and eventually finds out the truth of her own death. "Words" are collected throughout the story. For the final performance you will choose which words to use for your song. What do you want to convey? To who? Your words change the ending! A youth love story.
summary: Visual novel by Whomor. Available in the Story Me app.
